forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 5 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49. West southwest wind 8 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle warmth wraps around the city, heralding a day of mostly sunny skies. The early morning air carries a slight chill, hinting at the cooler temperatures predicted for the afternoon. As the sun rises, its rays dance across the shifting clouds, creating a soft glow that welcomes a lazy Saturday. The winds whisper at 5 to 21 mph, playfully tousling hair and ruffling the pages of any morning newspaper left on a café table.

Those venturing out today can expect temperatures to hover near 66, dipping to a mild 64 later on. The forecast speaks of clear skies, leaving little room for fog to linger, though a gentle marine layer may make a subtle appearance along the coastline. In this pleasant atmosphere, a simple hoodie layered over a light shirt would be fitting, ensuring comfort against the breeze without succumbing to the chill of the evening that approaches. 

While the world stirs, today is perfect for taking a leisurely stroll through Golden Gate Park or perhaps indulging in a visit to one of the many inviting coffee shops that dot the streets, where the richness of freshly brewed coffee mingles with the aroma of pastries. With each passing hour, the promise of spring whispers through the trees and blossoms, inviting San Franciscans to savor the beauty of the day, whether through a quiet moment on a park bench or a spirited walk along the bay.
